name: High Noon - Retroremake
description:
As part of my retro remake challenge, to re-create 12 classic Spectrum games in twelve months in honour of the 40th anniversary of the little machine from Sinclair that could, I present the third installment, High Noon originally by Work Force in 1983.

A deceptively simple game, base on the arcade original Boot Hill, this is a 1 or 2 player game, to be played at the same keyboard. The rules are simple, shoot the other cowboy before he shoots you, time is ticking he who gets the most hits before High Noon wins.

Original Game Design: Work Force

Character Models: Quaternius https://opengameart.org/users/quaternius

Main Menu Music: Chipmunk https://modarchive.org/module.php?139899

Funeral March: jkfite01 https://opengameart.org/users/jkfite01
